name: Psycho Dream
description:
Don't come ... Don't look for me ...
This title is an action game for Super Nintendo released in 1992.
Sayaka does not return to the real world after entering the world of virtual space called D-Movie. The main characters, Ryo and Maria, proceed through the horrifying fantasy software "Abandoned City Story" to save her.
Items (proteins) have different effects depending on the color, and have effects such as causing a freakout (transformation), to changing the attack method between short-range type and long-range type, and strengthening the attack power. Let's use them properly according to the situation and aim to clear all 6 TRACKs.
